verses.verse: "Be careful that <WG4337> you don't <WG3361> do <WG4160> your <WG5216> charitable giving <WG1654> before <WG1715> men, <WG444> to <WG4314> be seen <WG2300> by them, <WG1487> or else <WG1161> you have <WG2192> no <WG3361> reward <WG3408> from <WG3844> your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> who is <WG3588> in <WG1722> heaven. <WG3772>

But <WG1161> you, <WG4771> when <WG3752> you pray, <WG4336> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> your <WG4675> inner room, <WG5009> and <WG2532> having shut <WG2808> your <WG4675> door, <WG2374> pray <WG4336> to <WG3962> your <WG4675> Father <WG3962> who is <WG3588> in <WG1722> secret, <WG2927> and <WG2532> your <WG4675> Father <WG3962> who sees <WG991> in <WG1722> secret <WG2927> will reward <WG591> you <WG4671> openly. <WG5318>

In <WG1161> praying, <WG4336> don't <WG3361> use <WG945> vain repetitions, <WG945> as <WG5618> the Gentiles <WG1482> do; <WG1063> for they think <WG1380> that <WG3754> they will be heard <WG1522> for <WG1722> their <WG846> much speaking. <WG4180>

Therefore <WG3767> don't <WG3361> be <WG3666> like <WG3666> them, <WG846> for <WG1063> your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> knows <WG1492> what things <WG3739> you need, <WG2192> before <WG4253> you <WG5209> ask <WG154> him. <WG846>
Pray <WG4336> like this: <WG3779> <WG2257> 'Our Father <WG3962> in <WG1722> heaven, <WG3772> may your <WG4675> name <WG3686> be <WG37> kept holy. <WG3686>
Let your <WG4675> Kingdom <WG932> come. <WG2064> Let your <WG4675> will <WG2307> be done, <WG1096> as <WG5613> in <WG1722> heaven, <WG3772> so on <WG1909> earth. <WG1093>
Give <WG1325> us <WG2254> today <WG4594> our <WG2257> daily <WG1967> bread. <WG740>
Forgive <WG863> us <WG2254> our <WG2257> debts, <WG3783> as <WG5613> we <WG2249> also forgive <WG863> our <WG2257> debtors. <WG3781>

Bring <WG2532> us <WG2248> not <WG3361> into <WG1519> temptation, <WG3986> but <WG235> deliver <WG4506> us <WG2248> from <WG575> the evil <WG4190> one. <WG3754> For yours <WG4675> is <WG2076> the Kingdom, <WG932> the power, <WG1411> and <WG2532> the glory <WG1391> forever. <WG281> Amen.'
"For <WG1063> if <WG1437> you forgive <WG863> men <WG444> their <WG846> trespasses, <WG3900> your <WG5216> heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> will <WG863> also <WG2532> forgive <WG863> you. <WG5213>

But <WG1161> if <WG1437> you don't <WG3361> forgive <WG863> men <WG444> their <WG846> trespasses, <WG3900> neither <WG3761> will <WG863> your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> forgive <WG863> your <WG5216> trespasses. <WG3900>

so that <WG3704> you are not <WG3361> seen <WG5316> by men <WG444> to be fasting, <WG3522> but <WG235> by <WG3962> your <WG4675> Father <WG3962> who is <WG3588> in <WG1722> secret, <WG2927> and <WG2532> your <WG4671> Father, <WG3962> who sees <WG991> in <WG1722> secret, <WG2927> will reward <WG591> you. <WG4671>

but <WG1161> lay up <WG2343> for yourselves <WG5213> treasures <WG2344> in <WG1722> heaven, <WG3772> where <WG3699> neither <WG3777> moth <WG4597> nor <WG3777> rust <WG1035> consume, <WG853> and <WG2532> where <WG3699> thieves <WG2812> don't <WG3756> break through <WG1358> and <WG2532> steal; <WG2813>
for <WG1063> where <WG3699> your <WG5216> treasure <WG2344> is, <WG2076> there <WG1563> your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> will <WG2071> be <WG2071> also. <WG2532>

"The lamp <WG3088> of the body <WG4983> is <WG2076> the eye. <WG3788> If <WG1437> therefore <WG3767> your <WG4675> eye <WG3788> is <WG5600> sound, <WG573> your <WG4675> whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> will be <WG2071> full of light. <WG5460>

But <WG1161> if <WG1437> your <WG4675> eye <WG3788> is <WG5600> evil, <WG4190> your <WG4675> whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> will be <WG2071> full of darkness. <WG4652> If <WG1487> therefore <WG3767> the light <WG5457> that is <WG3588> in <WG1722> you <WG4671> is <WG2076> darkness, <WG4655> how great <WG4214> is the darkness! <WG4655>

"No one <WG3762> can <WG1410> serve <WG1398> two <WG1417> masters, <WG2962> for <WG1063> either <WG2228> he will hate <WG3404> the one <WG1520> and <WG2532> love <WG25> the other; <WG2087> or else <WG2228> he will be devoted to <WG472> one <WG1520> and <WG2532> despise <WG2706> the other. <WG3756> You can't <WG1410> serve <WG1398> both God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Mammon. <WG3126>

Therefore, <WG1223> I <WG5124> tell <WG3004> you, <WG5213> don't <WG3361> be anxious <WG3309> for <WG5590> your <WG5216> life: <WG5590> what <WG5101> you will eat, <WG5315> or <WG2532> what <WG5101> you will drink; <WG4095> nor yet <WG3366> for <WG4983> your <WG5216> body, <WG4983> what <WG5101> you will wear. <WG1746> Isn't <WG2076> life <WG5590> more <WG4119> than food, <WG5160> and <WG2532> the body <WG4983> more <WG4119> than clothing? <WG1742>

See <WG1689> the <WG1519> birds <WG4071> of the sky, <WG1689> that <WG3754> they don't <WG4687> sow, neither <WG3761> do they reap, <WG2325> nor <WG3761> gather <WG4863> into <WG1519> barns. <WG596> Your <WG5216> heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> feeds <WG5142> them. <WG846> Aren't <WG1308> you <WG3756> of <WG5210> much <WG3123> more <WG1308> value than they? <WG846>

yet <WG1161> I tell <WG3004> you <WG5213> that <WG3754> even <WG3761> Solomon <WG4672> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> his <WG846> glory <WG1391> was <WG4016> not <WG3761> dressed <WG4016> like <WG5613> one <WG1520> of these. <WG5130>

But <WG1161> seek first <WG4412> God <WG2316>'s Kingdom, <WG932> and <WG2532> his <WG846> righteousness; <WG1343> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> these things <WG5023> will be given <WG4369> to you as well. <WG5213>
